abstract: A community watchdog group expressed outrage and Wells Fargo said it was launching an investigation after a newspaper reported that a senior exec threw lavish parties at a beachfront Malibu house owned by the bank.
snippet: A community watchdog group expressed outrage and Wells Fargo said it was launching an investigation after a newspaper reported that a senior exec threw lavish parties at a beachfront Malibu house owned by the bank.
lead_paragraph: A community watchdog group expressed outrage and Wells Fargo said it was launching an investigation after a newspaper reported that a senior executive threw lavish parties at a beachfront Malibu house owned by the bank.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Begins Inquiry Into Parties at Malibu House
